name: Unbind S
description:
Unbind S is an arcadey parkour game where you never need to move backwards. This is a short demo/prototype that contains 3 levels (more to come later).  Let me know what you think!

Controls:

WASD- Move

SPACE - Jump

R - Restart from last checkpoint

TAB - Pause

Check out the tutorial for the rest of the controls.

Please note the web build does have some graphical glitches. For the best experience download the desktop version. Also you may want to turn down mouse sensitivity in the web version to around 10-20.
